keyword: calories in wendys small french fries
title: Calories in Wendy's Small French Fries
meta_description: Discover calories in Wendys small french fries—230 kcal per small serving—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and serving tweaks for better choices.
h1: Calories in Wendy's Small French Fries
assumptions: Standard Wendy's small french fries (about 113 g), fried in vegetable oil, with salt; based on official Wendy's nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, portion size, and customizations. Check Wendy's app or site for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A small serving of Wendy's french fries contains 230 calories, with 30 g carbs and 11 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: No salt added (reduces sodium but calories similar)

faqs.q: How many calories in Wendys small french fries?
What are the carbs in a small Wendy's fries?
faqs.a: 30 g total carbs, including 3 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat and sodium in Wendy's small french fries?
faqs.a: 11 g total fat (1.5 g saturated) and 260 mg sodium.
Generally yes, but cross-contamination possible; check with Wendy's for allergies.

faqs.q: How does small compare to medium Wendy's fries calories?
faqs.a: Medium has about 340 calories, 50% more than small.
